com.aurel.track.fieldType.runtime.callbackInterfaces

Interface ISelect

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ILookup
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomExtensibleSelectRT, CustomPickerRT, CustomSelectBaseRT, CustomSelectSimpleRT, CustomTreePickerRT, ItemPickerRT, OnBehalfOfPickerRT, ProjectPickerRT, SystemIssueTypeRT, SystemManagerRT, SystemPersonBaseRT, SystemPriorityRT, SystemProjectRT, SystemReleaseBaseRT, SystemReleaseNoticedRT, SystemReleaseScheduledRT, SystemResponsibleRT, SystemSelectBaseLocalizedRT, SystemSelectBaseRT, SystemSeverityRT, SystemStateRT, UserPickerRT

    public interface ISelect
extends ILookup
    Implemented by list based controls which need a dataSource to select from: system selects, custom simple selects, simple select parts of custom composites, custom radio buttons etc.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List loadCreateDataSource(SelectContext selectContext)
      Actualizes the dropDownContainer with the datasource for a select type field by creating a new issue.
      java.util.List loadEditDataSource(SelectContext selectContext)
      Actualizes the dropDownContainer with the datasource for a select type field by editing an existing issue.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.aurel.track.fieldType.runtime.callbackInterfaces.ILookup

        deserializeBean, getDataSource, getDropDownMapFieldKey, getIconCls, getLabelBean, getLookupIDByLabel, getNewSerializableLabelBean, hasDynamicIcons, isTree, lookupBeanAllowed, serializeBean

    • Method Detail

      • loadEditDataSource

        java.util.List loadEditDataSource(SelectContext selectContext)
        Actualizes the dropDownContainer with the datasource for a select type field by editing an existing issue. The result might differ from loadCreateDataSource because it might be needed to add the current value from the workItem to the list entries (when right already revoked for the current value).
        Parameters:
        selectContext -
        Returns:

      • loadCreateDataSource

        java.util.List loadCreateDataSource(SelectContext selectContext)
        Actualizes the dropDownContainer with the datasource for a select type field by creating a new issue. It might differ from loadEditDataSource because it might update this field in a workItem if the actual value from the workItem is not contained in the resulted select list. In this case the when a default value is defined (for ex. default manager, responsible, issueType for project) the field will be set to this value (if the default value is contained in the resulted list), otherwise to the first item from the list. When the list is empty this field should be set explicitly to null in the workItem. (An empty HTML list will not send request parameter and it will remain the original value. This should be avoided) So don't forget to actualize the workItem if needed. It is needed mainly by multiple cascading selects
        Parameters:
        selectContext -
        Returns:
